name: Red5 Pro Server
description: Red5 Pro is a real-time streaming server for live video and audio streaming. It supports WebRTC, RTMP, RTSP, HLS and SRT protocols for ultra-low latency streaming applications.

notes.text: Red5 Pro requires a valid license key from https://account.red5.net/ - You will be prompted for your license key during installation.
You will need to provide either: 1) Red5.net account credentials to download from red5.net, or 2) A custom URL where you have hosted the Red5 Pro server zip file.
Optional: Configure Let's Encrypt SSL during installation for HTTPS/RTMPS support. You'll need a domain name pointing to your server and ports 80/443 accessible from the internet.
Red5 Pro requires Java 21 (automatically installed). Default ports: 5080 (HTTP), 443 (HTTPS), 1935 (RTMP), 8554 (RTSP), 8443 (RTMPS), 40000-65535 (WebRTC/UDP).
For production deployments, ensure adequate CPU and RAM resources. Recommended: 4+ CPU cores, 4GB+ RAM for moderate streaming workloads.
